venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description:
Ever try a Lambic, Saison, Dubbel, Flanders Red, Quadrupel or Witbier? This fest offers hand-picked brewers of 100+ beers from here, there, and the inspired! Tickets are $45 per person, per session. Limited to 1,000 per session.


Get your tickets here:
http://beeradvocate.c...

Maybe if you're lucky, you'll unlock RedPint's Vow of Silence Medal. :-)
http://www.redpint.co...

Your ticket includes:
+ Entrance into one of best fests on Planet Earth.
+ All 2oz pours; Respect Beer.
+ Tasting cup.
+ Fest guide.
+ Beer education.
... and of course a kick-ass time.
item.name: Belgian Beer Fest
